actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of retirement income eligible for the tax credit for retirement income from $1, 524 to $5,000, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the amount of retirement income eligible for the tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code from $1,524, to $5,000,.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of retirement income eligible for the tax credit for retirement income from $1, 524 to $5,000, and for other purposes.
